required_ChG_text: ❌ Kechirasiz, botdan foydalanishdan oldin quyidagi kanallarga obuna bo‘lishingiz kerak:

greatings:

share_name_registration_text:

share_name_reistration_text_err: ❌ Xatolik yuz berdi, iltimos keyinroq qayta urinib ko‘ring!
